page.title: 14PETS
page.content:
This is a list of the pets we know of in the area cats,dogs,cows, pigs,sheep,ducks,goats,hens,fish, horses,cockerels,calves,geese,lambs, rabbits,guinea pigs,hamsters,mice, budgerigars,chickens,gerbils,birds, comet goldfish,anglo-nubian goat, ponies,tropical fish.
Cats eat Kit-e-cat and drink milk, and they catch mice. Dogs eat Pal, and drink water. Cows eat nuts,silage and hay. Hens eat bread,meal and corn.
The smaller pets are kept in cages, the fish kept in glass tanks.
Not all children are able to keep pets,so they look upon the school tropical fish as pets.
